SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreUrlRewrite] ( [CoreUrlRewrite_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreEntities_Code] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreEntities_KeyValue] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_UrlSource] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_UrlDestination] varchar(MAX) NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreUrlRewrite_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreUrlRewrite] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreUrlRewrite PRIMARY KEY ([CoreUrlRewrite_Ky])
